durtools.rationalize¶

abjad.tools.durtools.rationalize(lst)¶
Converts a list of duration tokens into Rationals. The given list can be a list of lists of ... lists of duration tokens. The list returned will preserve nesting.

Previous topic

durtools.prolated_to_written

Next topic
